sentences.en: An insane person is unaccountable for his actions.
sentences.cn: 精神病患者对其行为不负任何责任.

sentences.en: He got angry with me. He told me I was insane.
sentences.cn: 他生了我的气, 说我发了疯.

sentences.en: He must be insane to drive his car so fast.
sentences.cn: 他把车开得这么快,一定是疯了.

sentences.en: He must have been insane to sell his car for the mud.
sentences.cn: 他竟把汽车当废品卖掉,准是疯了.

sentences.en: I couldn't decide whether he was incredibly brave or just insane.
sentences.cn: 我不能判定他到底是英勇无畏还是精神失常。

sentences.en: I said, 'Listen, this is completely insane.'
sentences.cn: 我说：“听着，这简直荒唐之极。”

sentences.en: I said, "Listen, this is completely insane."
sentences.cn: 我说：“听着，这简直荒唐之极。”

sentences.en: I'm sick of this whole insane and vile war.
sentences.cn: 这场疯狂可耻的战争我实在受不了.
精神病人有时非常危险.

sentences.en: It resembles my own mind except that you happen to be insane.
sentences.cn: 它很象我自己的头脑,只不过你是精神失常的.

sentences.en: My desire to be rich was an insane, unwholesome, oppressive desire.
sentences.cn: 我对财富的渴望疯狂、病态，犹如心头的一块重石。

sentences.en: Some people simply can't take it and they just go insane.
sentences.cn: 一些人完全承受不了，结果就精神失常了。

sentences.en: The brave nurse wrested the knife from the insane man.
sentences.cn: 勇敢的护士从疯人手中夺走刀.

sentences.en: The letter made her insane with jealousy.
sentences.cn: 那封信使她妒忌得发疯.

sentences.en: The whole idea sounds absolutely insane to me.
sentences.cn: 整个主意在我看来荒谬至极。

sentences.en: What insane root she has been nibbling, I know not.
sentences.cn: 我不知道她到底啃了什么令人神智迷糊的树根.

sentences.en: Why did you do that? Have you gone insane?
sentences.cn: 为什么这么做？你疯了吗？
